resources.string: For signing up, agree to the Smart Travel Guide terms & conditions and privacy policy
By signing up, you agree to the Smart Travel Guide terms & conditions and privacy policy

--- How to use Smart Travel Guide App --- ? First user need to sign up into Smart Travel Guide App,then user can do many thinks listed below. 1.User can search any place on Map, 2. User can see his/her current location on Map, 3. User can browse many travel places, 4. User can make any place to his/her favourite place , and also user can see his/her favourite places on favourite Tap. 5. User can Update his/her profile 6. User can also sign using google accounts 6. User can search a place in search bar - search by place name :- matched place name will list. - search by country :- metched places in that country will list. - search by state :- metched places in that state will list. - search by city :- metched places in that city will list. - search by Postal Code :- metched places in that Postal code will list. - search by category of place:- metched places to that category will list. ---- How to Add Place in Smart Travel Guide App ? ---- For that User need to follow steps listed below. 1> click on Add place from Navigation 2> User will redirect to Map 2> in the Map, Seach a place which you want to add in Smart Travel Guide App, 3> Long click on place 3> then ,Marker for that place will appear 4> Click on Marker of place to add place 5> Then provide name,description,Image to that place and click on Add place. ---- How to Add/Remove place to favourite place ------ 1> Search a place in seach box 2> choose place 3> Click on Heart shape 4> to remove click again on Heart shape ----- Import to note. ------ User must use his/her email as his/her Username.

First user need to sign up into Smart Travel Guide App, then user can do many thinks listed below. 1.User can search any place on Map, 2. User can see his/her current location on Map, 3. User can browse many travel places, 4. User can make any place to his/her favourite place , and also user can see his/her favourite places on favourite Tap. 5. User can Update his/her profile 6. User can also sign using google accounts 6. User can search a place in search bar - search by place name :- matched place name will list. - search by country :- metched places in that country will list. - search by state :- metched places in that state will list. - search by city :- metched places in that city will list. - search by Postal Code :- metched places in that Postal code will list. - search by category of place:- metched places to that category will list.
